text: Vicki Ann Axelrad (also called Vicki Lawrence; born March 26 1949) is an American comedienne, actress and a singer. She is best known for her acting on the Carol Burnett Show and as Thelma Harper on Mama's Family. She was often on game shows in the 1970s and 1980s. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Inglewood, California Category:Singers from Los Angeles County, California Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American comedians
title: Vicki Lawrence
